content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Magdeburg, I have an ambitious target in mind. However, let's begin the negotiation and see how far we can push it.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your interest in finding a competitive price for this apartment, Mr. Schmidt. Starting the negotiation, I believe a reasonable rental figure for this modern, centrally located one-bedroom apartment would be around 450 Euros per month, considering its size and proximity to essential amenities.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my initial expectation was considerably higher. However, let's see if we can narrow the gap a bit.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I acknowledge your initial expectations were different, but we are trying to find common ground. To narrow the gap a bit, could we consider 500 Euros with the agreement that utilities are capped at a reasonable amount? This would allow both parties some flexibility in the long run.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Although I'm reluctant to lower my desired price significantly, your proposal with a capped utility cost does show some understanding of my position. In light of this, I agree to the price of 525 Euros per month with a maximum monthly utility cost limit mutually agreed upon before the lease signing. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
